name: Repair Master Fixing Expert 3D
description: Start the pc workshop in the town if you want to become a pro pc repair master to build and design a computer like a mastermind and manufacture the computer motherboard so play this game. Use multiple machines to fix the pc parts like graphics cards, CPU, DVD, and other electricity supply chains on the motherboards in the computer games. You will learn all tricks of computer part fixing. In this pc building and computer, repair staff uses a soldering machine to join all electrical wires. A brand new pc builder company is opening in your town and they are looking for a Pc skilled who has engineering and skills. Join the computer company you will learn all skills of laptop repairing, how to design, build, and assemble computer systems in large numbers.
